column2: "Excellent. I see you're one of the good ones. My fears were completely unfounded, then."
"Autowords not only lets you shout out battle cries, it also lets you warn others of danger, like if you get taken by surprise."
"Some ARKS members find really unique uses for it. You'd be missing out if you didn't jump in the game."
"Heh. This reminds me of this one time, in the old days, when I forgot my autowords were on... "
